Interface GridLambda

All Superinterfaces:
GridMetadataAware, GridPeerDeployAware, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface GridLambda
extends GridPeerDeployAware, GridMetadataAware

Common interface for closures, predicates and related entities. It defines any first-class function or monad as P2P deployment and meta-programming aware.
